|brand = ZyXEL |model = NBG5715 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = I88NBG5715 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 45-402-000341 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Mindspeed;Comcerto 1000;M83241G-13; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = ARM1136 |cpu1spd = 450<!-- 450MHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Ralink;RT3883; |cpu2_cores = 1 |cpu2_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = 500<!-- 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F1G08U0C-PCB0; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16CG-25C; |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 64 |ram2chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16CG-25C; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8328; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C8:6C:87 |oui = C8:6C:87
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;2.6.33.5;OpenWrt-deriv;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2567L;SiGe, 2567L, 111ES;3; ,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = ZyXEL |defaultssid_regex = ^ZyXEL$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = MitraStar |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/16/2011 |estreldate = 08/10/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 760559119652 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B005GRFC82 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT3883; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT3593; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The [[Mindspeed]] ''Comcerto'' 1000 (M83241G-13) CPU is the main SoC for device. :The RT3883 is apparently controlled via an MII interface (it's in ''iNIC'' mode). :The RT3593 appears to be controlled via the Comcerto's PCI bus.
The firmware provided by ZyXEL is ~14.5MB. :The stock firmware is an '''OpenWrt'''-dervative firmware. :The stock WebUI is a modified LuCI.
"45-402-000341" is silkscreened on the board shown below. :The default SSID for both bands is '''ZyXEL'''.
The power adapter included with the device is a :'''DVE''' DSA-24CA-12 120200 (12V, 2A).
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.zyxel.com/products_services/nbg5715.shtml Product Page] :[ftp://ftp2.zyxel.com/NBG5715/datasheet/NBG5715_3.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [ftp://ftp2.zyxel.com/NBG5715/quick_start_guide/NBG5715_001.pdf Manual] :[ftp://ftp2.zyxel.com/NBG5715/ Downloads] : [ftp://ftp2.zyxel.com/NBG5715/firmware/NBG5715_1.00(AAAG.5)C0.zip FW v.1.00(AAAG.5)C0]
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/nbg5715 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=33652 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *http://nbg5715.shy.cz/GPL/ :NBG5715_100AAAG2_open_code.tar.bz2 (04-May-2012 19:44 759M)
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== Telnet would seem to be enabled by default. :Credentials of '''root''':1234 for a router w/ default settings worked fine..
{{/Serial info}}
